properties.name: West New York
properties.description: Explore West New York with views of the Hudson River and Manhattan skyline.

properties.name: Rockefeller Center
properties.description: Start your day at Rockefeller Center, an iconic entertainment and shopping complex in Midtown.

properties.name: Rockefeller Christmas Tree
properties.description: Visit the famous Rockefeller Christmas Tree, a must-see during the holiday season.

properties.name: Rockefeller Skating Rink
properties.description: Glide on ice at the Rockefeller Skating Rink, a classic New York winter activity.

properties.name: Saks Fifth Avenue
properties.description: Check out the holiday displays and upscale shopping at Saks Fifth Avenue.

properties.name: Central Park
properties.description: Explore Central Park’s scenic pathways, lakes, and iconic landmarks.

properties.name: Belvedere Castle
properties.description: Visit this charming castle in Central Park.

properties.name: The Mall and Literary Walk
properties.description: Walk along this picturesque tree-lined walkway.

properties.name: Gapstow Bridge
properties.description: See one of the most iconic bridges in Central Park.

properties.name: Radio City Music Hall (Rockettes)
properties.description: Watch the Rockettes at Radio City Music Hall.

properties.name: Top of the Rock
properties.description: Visit the Top of the Rock for breathtaking views of New York City at night.

properties.name: Brooklyn Bridge
properties.description: Walk across the historic Brooklyn Bridge and take in stunning views of the city and the harbor.

properties.name: 9/11 Memorial & Museum
properties.description: Pay your respects and learn about the history of 9/11 at the Memorial and Museum in Lower Manhattan.

properties.name: Ellis Island
properties.description: Take a ferry ride to Ellis Island and discover the history of immigration to America.

properties.name: Statue of Liberty
properties.description: Visit the Statue of Liberty, one of the most iconic landmarks in the United States.

properties.name: Charging Bull
properties.description: Visit the famous Charging Bull statue on Wall Street.

properties.name: Wall Street
properties.description: Take a stroll down Wall Street, the financial hub of the U.S.

properties.name: Federal Hall
properties.description: Visit Federal Hall, a historic building where George Washington was inaugurated.

properties.name: Empire State Building
properties.description: Head to the top of the Empire State Building for breathtaking panoramic views of the city.

properties.name: Bryant Park
properties.description: Take a stroll through Bryant Park, where you can also visit the Winter Village market.

properties.name: New York Public Library
properties.description: Visit the historic New York Public Library, one of the city’s most beautiful landmarks.

properties.name: Macy’s
properties.description: Shop at the famous Macy’s in Herald Square.

properties.name: Times Square
properties.description: End the night with the bright lights and bustling energy of Times Square.

properties.name: Marquis Theatre (Elf)
properties.description: Catch a performance of Elf: The Musical at the Marquis Theatre.

properties.name: Chelsea Market
properties.description: Start your day with food and shopping at Chelsea Market, a famous indoor marketplace.

properties.name: The High Line
properties.description: Walk along the High Line, an elevated park that offers unique views of the city and the Hudson River.

properties.name: Hudson Yards
properties.description: Explore the new Hudson Yards development, home to luxury shopping, dining, and The Vessel.

properties.name: The Edge Observatory
properties.description: Experience breathtaking views from The Edge, an observation deck with a glass floor suspended 1,100 feet above the ground.

properties.name: Little Italy
properties.description: Explore Little Italy and enjoy some authentic Italian cuisine.

properties.name: Chinatown
properties.description: Visit Chinatown for unique shops and delicious Chinese food.

properties.name: Aire Ancient Baths
properties.description: Relax and unwind at the Aire Ancient Baths spa.

properties.name: LGA Airport
properties.description: Conclude your trip by catching your flight at LaGuardia Airport.
